title: Blue Jeans and Stilettos
description: Librarian Note: See Alternate Cover Edition HERE.Three quick reads in one book! BETRAYAL – Glenna West Betrayed by their writing partner, Marjorie Rogers and Denise Robb set out on a new journey which leads them to #1 on the New York Times Bestseller List. IT’S BETTER IN THE DARK – C. Deanne Rowe This birthday could change Sofie Edwards’ life forever as she discovers It’s Better in the Dark. TAKE A CHANCE ON LOVE – Maggie Rivers Jennifer Sinclair doesn’t want sex. Caleb Hollister wants Jennifer. Who wins?
author: Glenna West
